All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BWD
The BWD class implements the backward movement function for a cursor on a canvas.
COLOR
The COLOR class implements the color change function for a cursor.
Console
The Console class represents the console panel in the user interface.
Cursor
The Cursor class represents a drawing cursor with properties like position, angle, color, and thickness.
CursorManager
The CursorManager class manages multiple cursors, allowing selection, activation, and removal of cursors.
Evaluator
The Evaluator class is responsible for evaluating and executing commands based on the input.
FileManager
FileManager handles file operations such as saving and loading canvas content, creating new text files, and saving text file content.
FOR
The Class FOR.
Function
 
FWD
The FWD class implements the forward movement function for a cursor on a canvas.
IF
The Class IF.
InstructionBlock
The Class InstructionBlock.
InstructionFile
The InstructionFile class handles reading instructions from a specified file.
Lexer
The Lexer class is responsible for tokenizing input text into a list of tokens.
LOOKAT
The LOOKAT class implements the function to orient the cursor towards a specific point or another cursor.
MIMIC
The MIMIC class is an InstructionBlock that provides functionality to mimic the movement and actions of a cursor at specified coordinates.
MIRROR
The MIRROR class is an InstructionBlock that provides functionality to mirror cursors around a specified point or line.
MOV
The MOV class implements the function to move the cursor to a new position on the canvas.
Parser
The Parser class provides methods to parse and validate a list of tokens.
POS
The POS class implements the function to set the position of the cursor on the canvas.
THICK
The THICK class implements the function to set the thickness of the cursor's drawing line.
TokenType
The TokenType enum represents the different types of tokens that can be identified by the lexer.
TURN
The TURN class implements the function to rotate the cursor by a specified degree.
Variable
 
WHILE
The Class WHILE.
Window
The Window class represents the main application window.
